r.d: Yaf is a PHP framework similar to zend framework, which is written in c and built as PHP extension
r.n: - Avoided calling to get_class_entry for higher performance - Remove unnecessary stack variable initialization - Fixed mem leak reproted by test scripts - Added arginfo for all methods - Standardize error message - Add Yaf_Request::setRequstUri - Fixed build broken with PHP 5.4 - many other litte improvements
